timeSeriesQuery.timeSeriesQueryLanguage:
fetch k8s_container
| { { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/used_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/used_bytes }
    | union
  ; { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/request_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/request_bytes }
    | union }
| align next_older(2m)
| group_by [resource.project_id], .sum()
| outer_join 0
| div
| scale "%"

fetch k8s_container
| { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/used_bytes
  ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/used_bytes }
| union
| align next_older(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [resource.project_id], .sum()

fetch k8s_container
| { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/request_bytes
  ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/request_bytes }
| union
| align next_older(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [resource.project_id], .sum()

fetch k8s_container
| { { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/request_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/request_bytes }
    | union
  ; { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/used_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/used_bytes }
    | union }
| align next_older(2m)
| group_by [resource.project_id], .sum()
| join
| sub

fetch k8s_node
| { { metric kubernetes.io/node/memory/used_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/memory/used_bytes }
    | union
  ; { metric kubernetes.io/node/memory/total_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/memory/total_bytes }
    | union }
| align next_older(2m)
| group_by [resource.project_id], .sum()
| join
| div
| scale "%"

fetch k8s_node
| { { metric kubernetes.io/node/memory/total_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/memory/total_bytes }
    | union
  ; { metric kubernetes.io/node/memory/used_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/memory/used_bytes }
    | union }
| align next_older(2m)
| group_by [resource.project_id], .sum()
| join
| sub

{ fetch k8s_container
  | { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/request_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/request_bytes }
  | union
; fetch k8s_node
  | { metric kubernetes.io/node/memory/allocatable_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/memory/allocatable_bytes }
  | union }
| align next_older(2m)
| group_by [resource.project_id], .sum()
| join
| div
| scale "%"

{ fetch k8s_node
  | { metric kubernetes.io/node/memory/allocatable_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/memory/allocatable_bytes }
  | union
; fetch k8s_container
  | { metric kubernetes.io/container/memory/request_bytes
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/memory/request_bytes }
  | union }
| align next_older(2m)
| group_by [resource.project_id], .sum()
| join
| sub

fetch k8s_node
| { metric kubernetes.io/node/memory/total_bytes
  ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/memory/total_bytes }
| union
| align next_older(2m)
| every 2m
| group_by [resource.project_id], .sum()

fetch k8s_node
| { metric kubernetes.io/node/memory/allocatable_bytes
  ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/memory/allocatable_bytes }
| union
| align next_older(2m)
| every 2m
| group_by [resource.project_id], .sum()
